item.title: New interface
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Kk, been trying to hard code some interfaces and stuff with that tutorial…But, there’s one thing I don’t really get…

class9.anIntArray240[0] = IdofPos1; class9.anIntArray241[0] = XofPos1; class9.anIntArray272[0] = YofPos1;

Here’s my interface code…

[code] public static void YourInterface(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid)
{
Class9 class9 = addTab(7700);

		addInterfaceSprite(1000, 5, 6);


	class9.anInt261 = 0;
	class9.aBoolean266 = false;
	class9.anIntArray240 = new int[1];
	class9.anIntArray241 = new int[1];
	class9.anIntArray272 = new int[1];

		class9.anIntArray240[0] = IdofPos1;
		class9.anIntArray241[0] = XofPos1;
		class9.anIntArray272[0] = YofPos1;

}[/code]

Any help please…?..
